revision.text:
{{Content bundle}} == Information about this bundle == [[Rationale::This content bundle contains Property articles, which are used by the Automatic Semantic Forms extension. This content bundle is optional. The Automatic Semantic Forms extension also works without it]] {{Part of bundle|value=Automaticsemanticforms}} [[Installation dir::extensions/AutomaticSemanticForms| ]][[Dependency::smwhalo;156| ]] [[Dependency::semanticforms;212;212| ]] [[Dependency::Smwplus; 156; 156| ]] [[Dependency::Smwplussandbox; 100; 100| ]] [[Vendor::Ontoprise GmbH| ]] ;Copyright :[[Vendor::ontoprise GmbH]] ;Maintainer :[[Maintainer::ontoprise GmbH]] ;License :[[License::GPL v2]] ;Version :[[Ontology version::120]] ;How to use :The Properties, which are included in this content bundle can be used to annotate Properties and Categories in order to control automatic Semantic Forms creation. ;Sandbox :We:have created the [[ASF sandbox|sandbox article]] in this Wiki, which demonstartes some Features of the Automatic Semantic Forms extension. ;User manual :More information about the Automatic Semantic Forms extension and how to use it can be found in our [[Help Url::http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php/Help:Automatic_Semantic_Forms_extension%7CSMWForum%7CSMWForum| ]][http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php/Help:Automatic_Semantic_Forms_extension%7CSMWForum%7CSMWForum%7C smwforum]. ;This bundle contains these articles {{#ask:[[Part of bundle::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] |?=Link |?Rationale |link=subject |default=''none'' |mainlabel=- }} {{Content hash|value}}
[[Category:Content bundle|Content_bundle]]

Welcome to the
Automatic Semantic Forms sandbox!
Below you can play around with the Automatic Semantic Forms extension. This is easy and works like follows: #Enter an article name in the input field. Use the name of an article that does not yet exist. #Choose one of the categories in the dropdown box. #Hit the 'Try out' button.

|{{#ifeq:{{#isExtensionInstalled:automaticsemanticforms}} |true |Article name: {{#asfforminput:both|40|20|ASF Example||all|  Category:|Try out!|true}}|'''First, you have to install the Automatic Semantic Forms extension.'''}}{{#ifeq:{{#ask:[[:Category:Task]]|link=none}}|Category:Task|
Hint: Choose the category 'Phone call' as a first example!<(i><(small>|}} [[Rationale::This is the sandbox article for the Automatic Semantic Forms extension.| ]]{{Content hash|value}}{{Part of bundle|value=Automaticsemanticforms}}
